Name: Sundowner
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Popular with the safari set in South Africa, where it is made with locally produced brandy and an orange liqueur called Van der Hum. Adapted from a recipe in Lucius Beebe's 1946 The Stork Club Bar Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Sundowner contains 181 calories
